requirements.title: Merge prompt category and subcategory page into one page
requirements.description: The prompt categories page @frontend/src/pages/admin/PromptCategories.tsx and prompt subcategories page @frontend/src/pages/admin/PromptSubCategories.tsx shall be merged into one page with the name `Categories`. Think hard to create the best possible architecture and plan.

requirement.description: Implement one single page that includes prompt categories and prompt subcategories.
The page must have an easy-to-use design and user experience.
It must be possible to add and edit categories and subcategories.
It must be visible clear to see the dependency between a category and its subcategories.
